Text: Adu o̩la Jihofa kʼi abʼane̩ Hedrak ma
kpai He̩mat, ki te̩ kadʼo ge̩,
Omi la amʼe̩bie̩-wñ du bʼalu-wñ te̩,
Tak omi aruru ogu donyʼunyi-mi daka tod abogu le̩,
E̩ nagwoguyo̩ nana, uwe̩ o̩monobule̩ e-Zayo̩n!
I chʼe-we̩ onugo ge̩, tod e̩bie̩ alo-we̩
Mudabi wʼef aku, ame̩ ame̩namu e-ibe ekono le̩;
Todu u fu Juda fa ñw o̩la-mi;
Oñ ma ali Jihofa oji-ma ate̩,
Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ahie̩do̩ bʼo ma,
Taku Jihofa O̩jo̩-ma ajadu ma o̩jo̩ le̩
Todu, alifia-wñ tabale uto̩-wñ la gbe̩gbe̩!
